scripts.build: npm i && npm run build:webview-bridge && tsc
scripts.build:webview-bridge: (cd $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/www-src && npm i && npm run build) && rimraf www && mkdir www && cp $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/www-src/ns-webview-bridge.js www/ns-webview-bridge.js
scripts.build:typings: npm run build && (cd ../demo && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$PWD/../typings" tns build ios) && cp ../typings/i386/*NotaWebViewExt.d.ts platforms/ios/NotaWebViewExt.d.ts
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-webview-ext && cd ../src
scripts.plugin.tscwatch: npm run build:webview-bridge && npm run tsc -- -w
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build -- -skipLibCheck && npm-run-all --parallel plugin.tscwatch run.demo.ios run.http-server
scripts.demo.android: npm run build -- -skipLibCheck && npm-run-all --parallel plugin.tscwatch run.demo.android run.http-server
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && rimraf platforms hooks node_modules && npm install
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-webview-ext && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
